We also advise parents to visit schools, consider other information on school performance and programs, and consider family needs as part of the school selection process.

schools.name: Greeley Alternative School
schools.school-summary: Greeley Alternative School, a public school located in Peoria, IL, serves grades 6-12 in the Peoria Regional Office Of Education.
